endpoints.description: Retrieve detailed water consumption statistics for all monitored locations.
Submit new data to initiate analysis for potential leaks in specified areas.
Obtain usage trends over time for better forecast and planning.
Modify configuration settings of the water distribution monitoring system.
Fetch all alerts generated for unusual system behavior or anomalies detected.
Remove a resolved or erroneous alert from the system.
Generate and retrieve detailed usage and efficiency reports.
Check the operational status of all water consumption sensors.
Access distribution performance metrics for water systems.
Fetch suggested actions for optimizing water resource allocation to reduce wastage.
